mapper.insert: insert into news (title, content, photo_path, video_path_mp4, video_path_webm, video_path_ogg, user_id, twitter_id) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{photoPath}, #{videoPathMp4}, #{videoPathWebm}, #{videoPathOgg}, #{userId}, #{twitterId})
mapper.update: update news set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, photo_path = #{photoPath}, video_path_mp4 = #{videoPathMp4}, video_path_webm = #{videoPathWebm}, video_path_ogg = #{videoPathOgg}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select * from news where 1 = 1
and title like '%${title}%'
and content like '%${content}%'
and photo_path like '%${photoPath}%'
and video_path_mp4 like '%${videoPathMp4}%'
and video_path_webm like '%${videoPathWebm}%'
and video_path_ogg like '%${videoPathOgg}%'
and user_id = #{userId}
order by update_time desc
mapper.delete:

and title like '%${title}%'
and content like '%${content}%'
and photo_path like '%${photoPath}%'
and video_path like '%${videoPath}%'
